channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Since ChatGPT launched, job openings have plunged 30% while the stock market has surged 70%—but one economist says the true culprit isn’t AI
item.description: It's been called "the scariest chart in the world."

item.title: The government shutdown won’t be completely recouped—and it could cost the economy up to $14 billion, estimates say
item.description: The report says lost goods and services from furloughed workers’ downtime won’t be regained once the government reopens.

item.title: Samsung Finally Unveils Galaxy TriFold And Confirms Release Date Coming Soon
item.description: The three-screen Samsung Galaxy folder has now been unveiled in South Korea. Here’s what was revealed.

item.title: Apple iOS 26.1 Release Date: This Will Be The Next Key iPhone Update — Here’s When
item.description: The non-appearance of the strongly rumored iOS 26.0.2 tells us that the next iPhone update is just days away.

item.title: Porn Ban—New Warning For Millions Of iPhone And Android Users
item.description: If you access adult content on your smartphone, everything has now changed. Your device and your data may be at risk from the VPN you just installed.

item.title: Barry’s ‘cofounder’ unwinds at his own gym—but even he admits balance is elusive: ‘Many days I have to wake up and choose who I’m going to disappoint’
item.description: Barry’s chair went from joining the gym at 26 to running it—now, he still wears athletic wear to work, has the same lunch every day, and spends $2.70 ...

item.title: WhatsApp Confirms Sudden Backup Passkey Security Move For Billions
item.description: WhatsApp has suddenly confirmed a new security move for 3 billion users — here’s what you need to know about the backup passkey feature.

item.title: Largest US airlines raise pressure on Dems to 'pass a clean CR' and end shutdown
item.description: Major U.S. airlines are calling on Congress to reopen the government as TSA workers and air traffic controllers are continuing to work without pay.

item.title: Billie Eilish calls on billionaires to give away their wealth—with Mark Zuckerberg in the room: ‘If you’re a billionaire, why are you one?’
item.description: "No hate, but yeah, give your money away, shorties,” she said at the WSJ Magazine Innovator Awards.

item.title: Companies are trying to do too much with AI, says IT CEO: ‘Pick one or two domains and go end to end’
item.description: The key extracting ROI from gen AI projects is to choose your lane—and stay there.

item.title: ‘Escape From Tarkov’ Has Officially Gone Gold Ahead Of Release
item.description: With just a couple of weeks to go until the launch of Escape From Tarkov, the final build is now complete and ready to go.

item.title: Amazon’s stock soars toward its best day since 2022: ‘AI narrative has flipped'
Why an oil supply glut could sink prices to $35 a barrel next year
Trump admin revokes approval of 13 Mexican airline routes to US
item.description: The Trump administration revoked the approval of 13 Mexican airline routes into the U.S. in response to Mexico cancelling and freezing U.S. carrier fl...

item.title: Mortgage rates fall for fourth consecutive week, lowest level in over a year
item.description: The average rate on the 30-year fixed mortgage fell this week to 6.17%, according to the latest Freddie Mac data released on Thursday. That is down fr...

item.title: US retailers lowering prices on Hershey's candy ahead of Halloween: report
item.description: U.S. retailers are reportedly offering more discounts on Hershey candy before Halloween as the candy maker hiked prices over tariffs and cocoa inflati...

item.title: Amazon could be a 'top three' grocery player in the U.S., Jassy says
Meta sheds $215B in market value as Wall Street pans ‘runaway’ AI spending
Amazon raises full-year capex guidance to $125B as AI spending continues to grow
Fed cuts interest rates for second time this year amid labor market weakness
item.description: The Federal Reserve cut its benchmark interest rate for the second time this year despite elevated inflation amid concerns about weakness in the labor...

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
